website_summaries.verdict: An aesthetic and mess-free diffuser with 2 pleasant scents.
pros: Pick from either lemon grass or fresh linen scent
Aesthetically pleasing glass jar feels durable
Bottle comes prefilled with oil so there’s no messy setup
cons: Few scent varieties to choose from

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent
customer_reviews.text: Bought for use in our house while we sell it. We’ve received several compliments on how good it smells and have been asked where we bought it. Smells great but doesn’t overwhelm.
customer_reviews.author: skittlz

customer_reviews.title: Smells lovely
customer_reviews.text: I am actually using this in an PurSteam 530ml Essential Oil Diffuser, Noise Reduce Design - Quieter, Longer Mist Output and it smells beautiful and lasting longer than if used as reeds.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent scent
customer_reviews.text: Scent is overall pleasant. However, I need to be flipping the reeds constantly in order to actually smell the lemongrass (which can be annoying - making it part of your schedule to flip over when you just want to come home to a lemongrass smelling home). Nonetheless, longevity of scent is poor. The presentation of the product is nice. The wooden cap arrived discolored from a small section though.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Fresh smelling and long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: Have this sitting on the Peninsula in the kitchen. It's been a couple of weeks and I can still smell it in my bedroom. I love the lemongrass smell. Also, it says it'll last 2 months. I think it's going to last longer than that. It's been over 6 months. I can still smell it. Gotta love that lemongrass.
customer_reviews.author: TexRose57

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing this item. The first time we were blown away by the consistent Lemongrass scent for almost a YEAR! The second order had been barely a scent at two months. VERY disappointed for this product; which is not an inexpensive air freshener. We appreciate quality, when it is worth it. No further purchase should be expected from us. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine Poston

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent at first
customer_reviews.text: The scent can be strong at first and falls off, but it's easy to intensify it again by reversing the sticks to expose the liquid or adding more sticks. Not a bad air freshener, but not sure I'd get the same type again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Decorative,  smells great
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly, boxed well. Love the glass bottle; love that it is a family owned. Just wish it was stronger, use it in my bathroom and have to keep the door closed to smell it. Does smell really good!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Lemongrass is an ideal aromatic for peope with pets especially when fleas become problematic. Good but not the best. Not terribly strong as lemongrass can be. That is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: blessedheart

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Pledge and not secure.
customer_reviews.text: I received my diffuser today and it is ok. So first the bottle itself has no secure lid. You just place a top over the glass container. If you knock it over it will spill everywhere. Second the smell. It smells just like Pledge, the furniture cleaner. It is not horrible, but I would not order it again nor would I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Not too sweet yet not too bitter. A great product
customer_reviews.author: carla anderson stowe

customer_reviews.title: A little over priced
customer_reviews.text: A combination of luxurious hotel and rustic cabin in the product mostly in the packaging and marketing. The scent I got is lemongrass and pretty strong. I like it so far. I do think it is a bit overpriced. Maybe because of the heavy glass bottle ?
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It's a really good size bottle. The glass is thick and sturdy. The smell of the lemongrass is wonderful. It's so clean and fresh. I really like this diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: What is it?
customer_reviews.text: No where does it say lemongrass on it, and it doesn't smell like lemongrass at all..not sure what the smell is..not happy. It reminds me of the smell that you pickup in the Penn Station women's room, industrial, and not pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: nancy lee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this item, placed it on the tv stand near the front door. Refreshing lemon scent every time I walk in the door. Hopefully they develop some new scents and new products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Very very very light scent
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I don’t smell any scent after 3 or 4 days and I did reverse the sticks, it’s too light. I am a huge fan for perfume, this is just a way too light.
customer_reviews.author: Elma

customer_reviews.title: I like this diffuser because it does not have a very ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this diffuser because it does not have a very strong smell. I have had it for over a week and it looks like it will last a while. I like the smell of lemongrass, very clean scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute bottle and smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I am picking about smells and oils but this lemongrass is great. It’s not to strong or overwhelming. It makes my house smell nice
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Hands down a great reed diffuser set
customer_reviews.text: Great company and great product, the product smells great. I completely love it and the message that the company conveys is great.
customer_reviews.author: kevin954

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and smells really good.
customer_reviews.text: We used this product in our bathroom. it looks nice and smells even better! Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality item. Comes with instructions to emit the most smell. Also very contemporary if using in a family room. The lemongrass smell is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Smell makes me ill
customer_reviews.text: Whatever this scent is it smells nothing like lemongrass. I had to move it to a room I don't use because the smell is very unpleasant to me.
customer_reviews.author: Punky's Abuela

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our bathroom . Looks great and smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lemon Pledge
customer_reviews.text: This product is fine, but smells more like lemon pledge than lemongrass, which is slightly different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, Long-lasting Scent
customer_reviews.text: Following the directions on this reed diffuser has given my guest room such an amazing boost! It smells so good a fresh!!
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Don't know to purchase? DO IT.
customer_reviews.text: The product looks absolutely amazing and the smell lingers. It smells delicious and is quite relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Monique cavalo

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this reed diffuser! It makes my bathroom smell so good and looks so pretty sitting on the shelf. I will definitely be reordering in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Benton

customer_reviews.title: Rich scent
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, rich scent; fills the room very nicely! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Taras S.

customer_reviews.title: Did I Not Get What Others Did?
customer_reviews.text: The aroma is fine-- but I can barefly smell it from four feet away. I wrote the company and asked about the optimal room size for this diffuser-- and they never responded. Have a feeling it might be okay in a small, enclosed space like a hall half bath, but for a kitchen or living room, it sure was essentially useless. Very disappointed. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Coco Pazzo

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this order was above my expectations. Delivery was in a well sealed package so it would not break (unlike other experiences I’ve had), and there was a very nice note from the seller too. The product itself is great, I love the scent, it looks nice, and it’s well priced. I will be ordering another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R.

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoying this diffuser set... Great Product! <3
customer_reviews.text: I love lemongrass and this diffuser set smells AMAZING and very refreshing. I have it for almost 2 months now in one of the rooms in my house and it's still going strong (also not even halfway gone). Beautiful bottle and packaging! I am a fan and will be very interested to purchase again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: LRogers

customer_reviews.title: Lovey clean scent
customer_reviews.text: I received this yesterday and set it up today. I really like the fragrance, very clean scent. I don't like that one you take thw lid off the bottle the decorative lid that holds the reeds doesn't screw on, it just sits in the top of the bottle. That makes me nervous for some reason. Overall I enjoy the product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful packaging that would make a nice gift. Great option for people who want essential oil scents without having to use a candle or burner. Pleasant scent. Looks great in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: BuzztheKiller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t real thrilled with the fragrance and their customer service been over backwards to make it right for me. They were awesome to replace it with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnie

customer_reviews.title: Fresh scent
customer_reviews.text: Very fresh nice smell. I have the linen scent as well that I bought a few months ago and couldn't smell it as much as the lemongrass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barely smells
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bottle and great scent. The problem is that you can barely smell it, even after following directions and after flipping the reeds over.
customer_reviews.author: I. Ti

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: This smells SO good. I just got it and set it up following the very simple directions and my whole house smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany H

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lemongrass
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser is so simple to use and smells amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic scent
customer_reviews.text: I could smell it before I opened the shipping package! It smelled so good. It makes several rooms in my house smell fresh.
customer_reviews.author: @pheobieh

customer_reviews.title: I will be a frequent buyer! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and WOW... what a nice scent and lovely packaging!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells like it says!
customer_reviews.text: Once the product was received, you could actually smell it before you opened the box! smells good too!
customer_reviews.author: ranaal86

customer_reviews.title: I hate it
customer_reviews.text: It has that same horrible scent that you smell when you walk into a cheap nursing home.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Cambrij

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great reed diffuser! The scent is really nice and not too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Lasted almost a month now, only flipped two sticks for bursts and smell well maintained.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: excellent transaction
customer_reviews.text: shipped on time - love the fresh clean lemon scent
customer_reviews.author: marilyn hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Support small businesses.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised to receive such nice packagaing & a quality product from a small business like this. The scent is fantastic & very noticeable in the room we have it in (master bedroom). I like the look of the bottle & the contrast of the black reeds is very classy looking.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L

product_meta.title: Reed Diffuser Set - Lemongrass - Essential Oil Aromatherapy Scent Bottle and 6 Clog-Resistant Fiber Reeds - Premium Scented Diffusers for Oils - 5-Ounces
feature_bullets: TRUE TO SCENT FRAGRANCE. Clean lemongrass home scent made with premium essential fragrance oil that's not overpowering or suffocating.
LONG LASTING REED DIFFUSERS. High-quality, clog-resistant fiber reeds release scent into the air evenly over approximately 60 days.
YOU CONTROL THE SCENT-INTENSITY. Control the intensity of the scent by changing the number of reed diffuser sticks used and flipping them for a burst of fresh scent.
DECORATIVE REED DIFFUSER BOTTLE. Premium fragrance oil keeps your home smelling fresh while the beautiful glass jar design complements any decor.
100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. If you’re not completely satisfied Old Factory will refund your money no questions asked.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
